pageProduct.name: Off! Family Care Insect Repellent Pump 175g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Off! Skintastic FamilyCare Insect Repellent Spray has up to 4 hours long lasting protection against mosquitoes. Repel Mosquitoes, flies, sandflies, ticks & other biting insects.

OFF! Skintastic familycare Insect Repellent Spray with Picaridin is highly effective, yet gentle to skin in a softly scented, non greasy formula. It is specially formulated for the whole family* including children 12 months and over with up to 4 hours repellency against mosquitoes, flies, sandflies, and other biting insects.

- Non greasy & softly scented.

Suitable For: Children 12 months & over.

Size: 175mL

Warnings

Not to be applied to infants under 12 months of age unless on doctor's advice.

Not to be used for any purpose, or in any manner, contrary to this label unless authorised.

PRECAUTIONS

Keep out of reach children. If rash or irritation occurs, discontinue use. Do not spray directly on exposed foods or food utensils. Do not store or use near fire or flame.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

If poisoning occurs, contact a doctor or Poisons Information Centre. Phone Australia 13 11 26, New Zealand 0800 764 766.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: 92.8g/L Picaridin

Directions

Hold bottle upright and lightly spray all exposed skin in a slow sweeping motion from a distance of 15-20 cm. Do not spray towards eyes or mouth. To apply to face, firstly spray on hands and rub on. Reapply as necessary in cases of excessive perspiration.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Will irritate the eyes. Avoid contact with the eyes.

STORAGE AND DISPOSAL

Store in the closed original container in a cool dry place, out of reach of children. Do not store in direct sunlight. Dispose of empty container by wrapping in paper, placing in plastic bag and putting in garbage.
